subject: Re: [junit] from siva
msgSnippet: Siva, Welcome to the JUnit community. Naturally, as with many communities, there are minimum expectations for the members. May I suggest that it would be
messageBody:
Siva,

Welcome to the JUnit community. Naturally, as with many communities,
there are minimum expectations for the members. May I suggest that it
would be beneficial to study the most excellent article by Eric S.
Raymond: "How to ask questions the smart way". This document may be
found at the following location:

http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html

Also, please familiarise yourself with the wonders of the Google
search engine. Pop on over to http://www.google.com/ and type "junit"
into the search box and click the "I'm Feeling Lucky" button. This
will bring you to the JUnit website, where vast quantities of
documentation, articles and book recommendations abound.

Once again, welcome to the JUnit community. We hope that you enjoy
reading about JUnit and we do look forward to your continuing
involvement.

Simon
